description: My take on a white brownie, a yummy, morish, overly sweet treat perfect for a Sunday arvo treat!
keywords: Slice, brownies & rocky road,Pescatarian,Halal,Seafood free,Vegetarian,Tree nut free,Chocolate,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Raspberry Greek Yoghurt Blondies Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Combine eggs. Oil and sugar and mix. Add salt and baking agents.
Add in yoghurt and flour one tbs at a time until the mixture just comes together.
Add raspberries and about 3/4 of the chocolate.
Place in a square baking dish that has been prepared with baking paper.
Melt remaining chocolate and drizzle on top of the uncooked Blondie. * optional extra - drizzle with some raspberry or strawberry jam.
